archimate:Requirement.name: NC.1.3.1: Wireless access to the network (e.g. using Wi-Fi, satellite, microwave links, Bluetooth, infrared or ZigBee) should be subject to an information risk assessment and signed off by an appropriate business manager, prior to its implementation.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
